name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Proposal Copycat - AI Trained on Your Upwork Proposals

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Train AI to write Upwork proposals in your style by analyzing your successful past proposals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üìù Proposal Copycat: AI-Powered Upwork Proposals

Train AI to write winning Upwork proposals by learning from your successful past applications! This extension helps freelancers maintain their authentic voice while saving time on proposal writing.

üéØ KEY FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Analyzes your successful Upwork proposals to understand your writing style
‚Ä¢ Collects only "Hired" proposals to learn from your best work
‚Ä¢ Seamlessly integrates with ChatGPT/Claude for AI-powered proposal generation
‚Ä¢ Maintains your unique voice and expertise in every proposal
‚Ä¢ Simple 4-step process: Scrape, Portfolio, Prompt, Generate

üí° HOW IT WORKS:
1. The extension securely collects your successful Upwork proposals
2. Add your portfolio projects to showcase your expertise
3. Customize the AI prompt (or use our optimized default)
4. Generate personalized proposals for any job posting

üîí PRIVACY FIRST:
‚Ä¢ Works entirely on your local machine
‚Ä¢ No data is sent to external servers
‚Ä¢ Your proposals remain private and secure

‚ö°Ô∏è PERFECT FOR:
‚Ä¢ Busy freelancers who want to save time on proposals
‚Ä¢ Professionals looking to maintain quality while increasing proposal output
‚Ä¢ Anyone wanting to leverage AI while keeping their authentic voice

Start writing winning proposals faster while maintaining your unique style. Let AI learn from your success!

Note: This extension requires access to ChatGPT or Claude for proposal generation.
